mapper.select: SELECT sur.user_id AS 'userId', su.`name`AS 'userName', sur.role_id AS 'roleId', sr.`name` AS 'roleName' FROM ( SELECT sur.user_id,sur.role_id FROM `sys_user_role` sur WHERE sur.role_id = #{roleId} ) sur INNER JOIN sys_role sr ON sr.id = sur.role_id INNER JOIN sys_user su ON su.id = sur.user_id
